_README: Add your commentary for mergers here. Use the merger_id as the key (e.g., 'MN-01016'). All fields are optional. Commentary text supports full markdown formatting.

_example.commentary:
Your analysis or commentary text here. Supports **markdown** formatting:

- Bullet points
- **Bold** and *italic*
- [Links](https://example.com)
- And more!
_example.author: Your Name

MN-01016.commentary:
This acquisition represents Asahi's continued expansion in Australian beverage manufacturing infrastructure.

**Key points:**
- Phase 1 determination approved
- No significant competition concerns identified
- Part of broader consolidation in beverage manufacturing
